name: Sweet Escape (UpperX)
description:
Welcome to Sweet Escape

This is a 2 player split-screen platformer where you play as a piece of candy and try to escape the children on Halloween night. The object is to reach the finish line first or be the last one to survive. Dodge obstacles by jumping over them and sliding under them. Collect candies along the way to gain points and collect lollipops to store candy wrappers. Candy wrappers can be used to throw behind you to slow down the children chasing you.

Controls:

D/L to Jump (double tap for double jump)

S/K to Throw 

A/J to Slide

Enjoy!
